document.docAuthor: Motamedinia, Behnam, Skevington, Jeffrey H. & Kelso, Scott
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Tomosvaryella Aczél (Diptera: Pipunculidae) in the Middle East, with description of 19 new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of Tomosvaryella Aczél (Diptera: Pipunculidae) in the Middle East, with description of 19 new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pipunculus minimus Becker, 1897
.—syn.
Földvári & De Meyer (1999) : p. 320
.

Distribution: Belgium , Czech Republic , Denmark , France , Germany , Great Britain , Hungary , Iran , Israel , Italy , Latvia , Mongolia , Morocco , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Russia , Slovakia , Spain , Sweden , Switzerland ( Skevington 2020 ) ( Fig. 58 ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 23. Male genitalia of
Tomosvaryella kuthyi
(JSS52019, CNC) A) A) dorsal view, B) ventral view, C, D) lateral view.

FIGURE 24. Male genitalia of

(JSS52091, TAU) A) dorsal view, B) ventral view, C, D) lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note: Based on DNA barcodes,
T. minima
is most similar to
T. minuscula
(3.6% pairwise divergence) (Supplementary Table 1 ).
